participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is a down-to-earth guy who enjoys the simple pleasures in life. He is friendly and approachable, often looking out for his friends.
participant_1.background: I'm a loyal friend who is always there for my people. I like to shoot a bow. I prefer to live where the weather's cold. I sell real estate and wait tables on the weekends. I'm a simple man.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is an enthusiastic and creative individual with a passion for dance and technology. She is driven and balances her interests well.
participant_2.background: I want a place where I can practice my dancing. I'm proud of my ability to juggle my many roles and responsibilities. My mom is my best friend. I love robotics. I have not had time to visit a fortune teller, but I am curious about what my future holds.

content.text: Hi! how are you today?
Hey there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
That's great to hear! What are you up to today?
Just got back from robotics practice and I'm planning on going to the library later.
Oh cool! I used to love robotics. What kind of robotics do you do?
I do mostly coding and building. I'm currently working on a robot that can walk.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to build a robot.
You should try it! It's really fun and it's a great way to learn.
I might just do that. Thanks for the inspiration!
No problem! What do you do for fun?
I like to go shooting, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
Oh cool! I like to dance and play video games too.
Nice! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but I'm really into RPGs right now.
I love RPGs too! I've been playing a lot of Skyrim lately.
Skyrim is great! I've been playing a lot of Witcher 3.
Oh nice! I've heard good things about that game.
It's really good! I'm really enjoying it.
I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun
